remarks: The power series/polynomial variable function maps indices to polynomials.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mvrf2.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mvrf2.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
mvrf2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
mvrf2.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mvrf2.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mvrf2 $p |- ( ph -> V : I --> B ) $.
